 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png>

Enhanced Medical Insurance | You Spoke, We Listened 

Your health and wellbeing matter to us, and your feedback has helped shape our renewed CIGNA medical insurance.
You now have access to dental coverage, online mental therapy, and expanded health screenings - all designed to support you better.

Look out for an email from CIGNA with the Subject Line: “Welcome to your Smartcare by Cigna Plan” to review your coverage.

Take care & stay well!

More details here! <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=380&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Explore our new Internal Audit Page

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=381&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Explore our new Internal Audit Page

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=381&user=10620> 	

The Internal Audit Page is now live on the OneChalhoub! Visit the page <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=381&user=10620>  to learn more about the department’s Vision, key services and get to know the Team.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

FACES beauty blockbuster

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=382&user=10620> 	

Faces presents the return of the iconic Beauty Blockbuster; 31 thoughtfully curated products inspired by our three Ramadan Rituals - Reflect, Renew and Radiate. It is designed for you to discover the depths of beauty throughout the holy month, during different times of the day. Explore the limited edition collection this Ramadan in-store or online.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-7-min.png> 	

Laila Abdalla's Swarovski Ramadan picks

Discover Laila Abdallah's picks and our best sellers from the exclusive Ramadan collection and shop jewellery pieces crafted to bring a radiant glow to every occasion.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=383&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-4-min.png> 	

Explore Adolfo Dominguez
